data.title: Adolf in Blunderland. by Dyrenforth, James., Kester, Max.: Good Hardcover (1940) Reprint/First Edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - Reprint/First Edition. - Hardcover - Frederick Muller Ltd., London, - 1940 - Condition: Good - Good - 60pp, illustrated. A political parody of Lewis Carrolls's famous story presented as a BBC play. This copy inscribed 'To Miss KMC (Kathleen Dorothy Cavendish Murray-stage name Kay Cavendish) From MK } in other words, to Kay from Max, with love. ' Wrapper is small chips, light soiled but unclipped, book is light wear. 450g - Adolf in Blunderland.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We are happy to provide photographs and expanded description on all titles. Books may be returned within 14 days (UK) or by arrangement. We recycle packaging but will provide new at Â£1.00 extra if requested. Please note that books to EU countries will be subject to VAT regulations. All export orders include Airsure insurance. We are; at present, Internet sales only. Wants lists serviced.

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
